sentences.cn: 增长速度超过资源承载力的人口

sentences.en: Adults usually do not lose their allergies but children can sometimes outgrow them.
sentences.cn: 成人通常不会失去他们的过敏症,但小孩有时成长得太快而失去.

sentences.en: Give children's clothes to another family when your kids outgrow them.
sentences.cn: 把孩子长大后穿不了的衣服送给另一家.

sentences.en: Harry outgrew his cot when he was about two.
sentences.cn: 哈里差不多两岁时就睡不下婴儿床了。

sentences.en: The little girl will outgrow her fear of pet animals.
sentences.cn: 小女孩慢慢长大后就不会在怕宠物了.

sentences.en: These mutant plants eventually outgrow the infection.
sentences.cn: 这些变异植物最终成功抵抗了感染.

sentences.en: They outgrow their clothes so quickly.
sentences.cn: 他们长得这么快，衣服很快就穿不下了。

sentences.en: Will my child outgrow the squint?
sentences.cn: 斜视对儿童有什麽影响?

words.tran_cn: 过大而不适于；出生；长大成熟而不再

trans.tran_cn: 过大而不适于；出生；长大成熟而不再
trans.tran_en: to grow too big for something

trans.tran_cn: 过度成长，因年龄增加而失去，年长而不再需要，生物长出
trans.tran_en: to grow or increase faster than someone or something else
